description: Episode of Series "The Researchers". The Snowy Mountains of South East Australia, despite their rugged, unchanging appearance are, in reality, quite fragile and quite sensitive to the forces of nature and the presence of people. The wild beauty of Kosciusko's alpine flora is recorded by a research team for a new book.
